words.definition: To anticipate something is to think that it will happen.
words.example: Carrie anticipated the arrival of her baby.

words.definition: A barrel is a round thing that you can keep liquids in.
words.example: There was an empty barrel outside the house.

words.definition: A beam is a heavy bar (used in construction).
words.example: Modern skyscrapers are made with several beams.

words.definition: If something is casual, it is relaxed or simple.
words.example: You can wear casual clothes to the party like jeans.

words.definition: Caution is care and attention in order to avoid danger.
words.example: Please use caution when crossing the street.

words.definition: If something is contrary to something else, it is the opposite.
words.example: It GS was contrary to what I expected.

words.definition: If an action is deliberate, it is done on purpose.
words.example: The GS mistake was deliberate.

words.definition: To dissolve something is to mix it into a liquid until it disappears.
words.example: The GS sugar dissolved in the tea.

words.definition: To explode is to blow up.
words.example: The GS bomb exploded.

words.definition: To fasten something is to close it or tie it tightly.
words.example: Please GS fasten your seatbelt.

words.definition: A germ is a very small living thing that can make you sick.
words.example: You GS should wash your hands to get rid of germs.

words.definition: A kit is a set of tools or things used for a specific purpose.
words.example: The GS first aid kit was in the car.

words.definition: A puff is a small amount of smoke or air.
words.example: A GS puff of smoke came out of the chimney.

words.definition: A rag is a small piece of old cloth.
words.example: He GS used a rag to clean the table.

words.definition: To scatter is to go or move in many different directions.
words.example: The GS birds scattered when they saw the cat.

words.definition: A scent is a smell, especially a pleasant one.
words.example: The GS scent of the flowers was very nice.

words.definition: Steel is a strong metal made from iron.
words.example: The GS building was made of steel.

words.definition: If something is swift, it is very fast.
words.example: The GS horse was very swift.

words.definition: To toss something is to throw it softly.
words.example: He GS tossed the ball to his friend.

words.definition: A triumph is a great victory or success.
words.example: The GS team's triumph was celebrated by everyone.
